LanguageData.Mousekin_ManureToSaltpeter.label: 用粪肥浸润生成硝石
LanguageData.Mousekin_ManureToSaltpeter.description: 用200单位巨豚鼠粪便和50单位木灰浸润生成100单位硝石。
LanguageData.Mousekin_ManureToSaltpeter.labelOverride: 用200单位巨豚鼠粪便和50单位木灰浸润生成100单位硝石
LanguageData.Mousekin_MilkToCheese.label: 用牛奶制作三叶草伯里芝士
LanguageData.Mousekin_MilkToCheese.description: 用50单位牛奶压榨成25单位三叶草伯里芝士。
LanguageData.Mousekin_MilkToCheese.labelOverride: 用50单位牛奶压榨成25单位三叶草伯里芝士
LanguageData.Mousekin_WheatToFlour.label: 将小麦磨成面粉
LanguageData.Mousekin_WheatToFlour.description: 将100单位小麦磨成75单位面粉。
LanguageData.Mousekin_WheatToFlour.labelOverride: 将100单位小麦磨成75单位面粉
LanguageData.Mousekin_WoodLogToCharcoal.label: 用原木碳化制作木炭
LanguageData.Mousekin_WoodLogToCharcoal.description: 用300单位原木碳化制作600单位木炭。
LanguageData.Mousekin_WoodLogToCharcoal.labelOverride: 用300单位原木碳化制作600单位木炭
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortLagerToLager.label: 将拉格麦汁发酵成拉格啤酒
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortLagerToLager.description: 将25单位白鼠族拉格麦汁发酵成白鼠族拉格啤酒。
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortLagerToLager.labelOverride: 将25单位白鼠族拉格麦汁发酵成白鼠族拉格啤酒
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortMeadToMead.label: 将蜂蜜酒原浆发酵成蜂蜜酒
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortMeadToMead.description: 将25单位白鼠族蜂蜜酒原浆发酵成白鼠族蜂蜜酒。
LanguageData.Mousekin_WortMeadToMead.labelOverride: 将25单位白鼠族蜂蜜酒原浆发酵成白鼠族蜂蜜酒
LanguageData.Mousekin_SyrupRootBeerToRootBeer.label: 将根汁啤酒糖浆发酵成根汁啤酒
LanguageData.Mousekin_SyrupRootBeerToRootBeer.descrip: 将1瓶白鼠族根汁啤酒糖浆发酵成25单位白鼠族根汁啤酒。
LanguageData.Mousekin_SyrupRootBeerToRootBeer.labelOv: 将1瓶白鼠族根汁啤酒糖浆发酵成25单位白鼠族根汁啤酒
